title: Aurelion Sol Gameplay Suggestion
body:
Lately I have bought Aurelion Sol and i must say he's pretty fun. Especially if you get to late game with him.

But the fun instantly stops when you get to lane against Zed, Yasuo, Talon or any champ who can get fast inside your inner circle of Stars.
If that happens you got 3 options.

1.) Flash
2.) Ult
and if those 2 are on CD:
3.) Die

Two suggestions that wouldnt make him OP and still he had some counterplay to those.

1.) Let him Detonate Q instantly after you cast it.

So those assasins have to wait for a window when his q is on CD.

2.) Do not draw back his stars when he gets Stunned/Silenced/etc.

His gameplay designer once stated it doesnt seem right that a big mighty star dragon can hide in brushes and sneak on their prey. So they made his stars visible in brushes, which is indeed annoying but i get the point. At least you cant be directly targeted. 

But then in my opinion its also not right that a stun can stop those mighty stars from orbiting. 


Your Opinion on this guys?
